title: IconDM: Text-Guided Icon Set Expansion Using Diffusion Models
details: J Lin, Z Jiang, J Guo, S Sun, T Liu, ZJ Yang, JG Lou… - ACM Multimedia 2024
abstract: Icons are ubiquitous visual elements in graphic design. However, their creation is non-trivial and time-consuming. To this end, we draw inspiration from the booming text-to-image field and propose Text-Guided Icon Set Expansion, a task that allows …
